In other words, the President Bush administration formed the Quartet to insulate itself from blame for diplomatic failure and unilateralism. Across the nation there's a feeling of defiance among politicians. They are undeterred by the violence that erupted at Gabrielle Giffords ' political event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8, 2011. I think right now she is inspiring all of us, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.).`` I think she is inspiring our nation with her courage, with her strength.''
